### HTML textbox annotations with `annotation_textbox` 

```{r}
annotation <- "
  <span style=\"font-size:18px; font-family:'Inter-Black';\">
   This is a cat:</span>
  <br><br>
  <span style=\"font-size:72px; color:'#7950F2';
   font-family:'FontAwesome5-Solid';\">cat</span>
  <br><br>
  Just look at this cat!
"

tbox <- annotation_textbox(
   html = annotation,
   position = "top-right",
   halign = 0.5
 )

p + annotation_custom(tbox)
```
